name: Benedict Cumberbatch (Sherlock) - Tumblr 01
description:
A theme of the British actor Benedict Cumberbatch in Sherlock. 
The picture has been edited by cumberswag: 
http://cumberswag.tumblr.com/post/72943498402
Designed for a resolution of 1280x800.


INSTRUCTIONS

1. Install Stylish.
- For Firefox: http://bit.ly/LAEhDW
- For Google Chrome: http://bit.ly/Ly6Cyx

2. Click the 'Install with Stylish' button below.

3. Check out your new Tumblr dashboard!

Feel free to follow me at GayNerdInTraining.tumblr.com :)
